body_html:
This is a fine suggestion, and something we have been discussing internally. I'm assigning this issue to @jsimsa, who has expressed interest in developing it.

@cgarciae There are a lot of possible designs for a feature like this. Have you had any thoughts on what your ideal API would look like for this task?
